name: Dinner Tonight: Shrimp Bruschetta from 'da Zaccaria'
description: This Mario Batali recipe comes from his Simple Italian Food, a book that I somehow missed out on. I love his Molto Italiano and the Babbo Cookbook, but was a little surprised to find this amongst the stack at the...

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the oil into a large saute pan over high heat. When just starting to smoke, toss in the garlic. Cook until it turns light brown.
Add the shrimp and cook for about 2 to 3 minutes, flip, and cook for 1 minute. Remove the shrimp.
Pour in the the limoncello, lemon juice, and wine. Bring to a boil and cook for 3 minutes.
When sauce is done, turn off the heat, sprinkle in the chives and season with salt and pepper.
Place a few shrimp atop each piece of bread, and top with the sauce and lemon zest.
